newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Informix estimates cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Informix estimates cut.

text.p: --Donaldson Lufkin and Jenrette analyst Frank Michnoff cut his Q4 1996 EPS estimate for Informix Corp to $0.25 from $0.27 and FY 1997 EPS estimate to $0.95 from $1.00 based on heightened market competition.
--Michnoff said "concerns are that revenue growth has been slowing and spending is such that operating margins are down year-over-year."
--said that "competition has been tough and I see very good momentum at Oracle Corp and Microsoft Corp and Informix is a small player and at a disadvantage because of that."

--Shares of Informix, a maker of computer database software, were 1-7/8 lower at 18-3/4. Almost 11 million shares were traded by early afternoon making it the most heavily trading company on Nasdaq on Tuesday.
